meya swamiya sita widyawa pilibanda waidyawarayeku wetha widyathmaka gamana thula atharamadi piyawarak wana athara, ema ayadumkaruta pradanaya: eya usas adhyapana atha; mama siyalu apekshaka wibhaga samath; ohu obage mathrukawa pilibandawa paryeshana malawak sidu; ohu waradi matha ha widyathmaka adahas prayogika watinakama handunwa dun athara, pradarshanaya, eya kriya patipatiya sammatha nibandhaya aaraksha wyawasthapitha awashyatha anuwa.
